thread.title: Bluepoint Solutions Expands Partnership to Offer Mitek MiSnap™ Auto Capture for Mobile Deposit
thread.title_full: Bluepoint Solutions Expands Partnership to Offer Mitek MiSnap™ Auto Capture for Mobile Deposit

author: Jennifer Quimson
title: Bluepoint Solutions Expands Partnership to Offer Mitek MiSnap™ Auto Capture for Mobile Deposit
text:
Bluepoint Solutions today announced an expanded partnership with Mitek (Nasdaq:MITK), the leading innovator of mobile capture and identity solutions for customer acquisition. Bluepoint’s mobile remote deposit capture (RDC) solution, QwikDeposit ToGo, will now include Mitek MiSnap™ for automated mobile check capture. With QwikDeposit ToGo and Mitek MiSnap, mobile check capture becomes almost effortless. When an account holder initiates a mobile deposit and is prompted to take a picture of the check, they simply hover the camera-equipped smartphone over the document. Mitek MiSnap provides continuous real-time feedback until a suitable image is detected, and then automatically captures the image. Within seconds, an ideal Check-21 image is ready for deposit. The account holder benefits from the quick, error-free deposit, and no back office review is needed.
“Bluepoint was one of the earliest providers of Mitek’s Mobile Deposit. The simplicity and the efficiencies of using the camera for check deposit has made is a preferred deposit channel for consumer and financial institutions,” said James B. DeBello, president & CEO, Mitek. “Adding Mitek MiSnap will further enhance the user experience for Bluepoint's customers, which will increase satisfaction among current account holders and accelerate adoption rates.”
“The use of mobile RDC is quickly becoming universal. Our expanded partnership with Mitek, and the exceptional ease of use of Mitek MiSnap, will make check capture accessible to an account holder at any level of technical ability and in any situation,” said Hal Tilbury, CEO of Bluepoint Solutions. “We are excited to help our bank and credit union clients bring even greater convenience to their customers and members.”
About Bluepoint Solutions
Bluepoint Solutions provides end-to-end payment processing and content management solutions to community financial institutions. More than 1,400 credit unions and banks nationwide have deployed its enterprise technology, including the largest corporate credit unions and credit union service organizations in the country. Learn more at http://www.bluepointsolutions.com .
About Mitek
Headquartered in San Diego, CA, Mitek (NASDAQ: MITK) is the leading innovator of mobile capture and identity solutions for customer acquisition. Mitek’s patented mobile photo technology automatically captures images of financial and personal documents and then extracts relevant data. This enables consumers to use the Camera as a Keyboard™ to reduce friction for mobile check deposit, account opening, bill payment, insurance quoting, and many other use cases. This innovative technology is licensed by more than 3,700 organizations and used by tens of millions of consumers enabling increased customer acquisition, retention and operational efficiency. http://www.miteksystems.com
